items.prompt: The ________ rate tells you how much your money is worth in another currency.
items.explanation: El tipo de cambio (exchange rate) determina el valor de una moneda frente a otra.

items.prompt: This bank has the ________ (low) fees for international transfers.
items.explanation: Usamos el superlativo 'lowest' (las más bajas) para comparar más de dos opciones.

items.prompt: A bureau de ________ is a place where you can swap currencies.
items.explanation: La oficina de cambio se llama 'bureau de change'.

items.prompt: I need to ________ some cash from that ATM over there.
items.explanation: 'Withdraw' significa retirar dinero del cajero.

items.prompt: That is the ________ (expensive) city I have ever visited.
items.explanation: Para adjetivos largos, el superlativo es 'the most expensive'.

items.prompt: Is this the ________ (near) bank to the airport?
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'near' (cerca) es 'nearest' (el más cercano).

items.prompt: This is the ________ (good) exchange rate of the day.
items.explanation: El superlativo irregular de 'good' es 'the best' (el mejor).

items.prompt: Order the words: the / best / rate / This / is
items.explanation: Sujeto + is + superlativo + sustantivo.

items.prompt: A ________ is an extra charge for a service.
items.explanation: Una comisión o cargo se dice 'fee'.

items.prompt: Always check for the ________ (small) details in the travel insurance.
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'small' es 'smallest' (el más pequeño).

items.prompt: What is the ________ (bad) thing about traveling?
items.explanation: El superlativo irregular de 'bad' es 'the worst' (lo peor).

items.prompt: I have some ________ (foreign) currency in my wallet.
items.explanation: Moneda extranjera se dice 'foreign currency'.

items.prompt: Order the words: most / expensive / hotel / That / is / the
items.sentence: That is the most expensive hotel
items.explanation: Estructura del superlativo para adjetivos largos.

items.prompt: A ________ is paper money.
items.explanation: Un billete de papel se llama 'note'.

items.prompt: Who is the ________ (rich) person in the world?
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'rich' es 'richest'.

items.prompt: Before traveling, you must ________ your bank.
items.explanation: Debes avisar o notificar (notify) a tu banco.

items.prompt: Order the words: the / richest / He / is / man
items.explanation: Él es el hombre más rico.

items.prompt: The ________ currency in Spain is the Euro.
items.explanation: La moneda local (local currency) de España es el Euro.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (large) ATM network in the country.
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'large' (grande) es 'largest'.

items.prompt: Which of these is the ________ (safe) way to carry money?
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'safe' es 'safest' (el más seguro).

items.prompt: Order the words: largest / the / city / London / is
items.explanation: Londres es la ciudad más grande.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (easy) way to change money.
items.explanation: Adjetivo en 'y': cambiamos 'y' por 'i' + est.

items.prompt: You need a ________ to use an ATM.
items.explanation: Necesitas el PIN (número secreto).

items.prompt: He is the ________ (helpful) employee here.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'the most helpful' (el más atento).

items.prompt: A ________ is a metal piece of money.
items.explanation: Una moneda de metal se llama 'coin'.

items.prompt: Which exchange office is the ________ (convenient)?
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'convenient' (conveniente/práctico).

items.prompt: The airport is the ________ (far) place from here.
items.explanation: Superlativos de 'far': 'farthest' o 'furthest'.

items.prompt: Order the words: cheapest / the / way / is / That
items.explanation: Esa es la forma más barata.

items.prompt: If you use a credit card abroad, you might pay a ________ surcharge.
items.explanation: Un recargo adicional se llama 'surcharge'.

items.prompt: Is this the ________ (fast) ATM in the building?
items.explanation: Superlatico de 'fast' es 'fastest'.

items.prompt: What is 'cash' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Cash' significa dinero en efectivo.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (important) rule for travel.
items.explanation: Superlativo de adjetivo largo: 'the most important'.

items.prompt: Order the words: common / most / The / is / currency / dollar
items.sentence: The dollar is the most common currency
items.explanation: El dólar es la moneda más común.

items.prompt: A ________ shows proof of your payment.
items.explanation: Un recibo o comprobante de pago es un 'receipt'.

items.prompt: Which city has the ________ (high) cost of living?
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'high' es 'highest'.

items.prompt: To 'convert' money is to swop it into another ________.
items.explanation: Convertir dinero en otra divisa o moneda (currency).

items.prompt: Order the words: lowest / The / commission / is / here
items.explanation: La comisión es la más baja aquí.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (bad) trip I have had.
items.explanation: El superlativo irregular de 'bad' es 'the worst'.

items.prompt: What is a 'daily limit' on an ATM card?
items.explanation: El 'daily limit' es el límite máximo de retiro diario.

items.prompt: The ________ (busy) day at the bank is Friday.
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'busy' (concurrido) es 'busiest'.

items.prompt: A ________ case is for your passport and cards.
items.explanation: Una billetera o cartera es un 'wallet'.

items.prompt: Order the words: nearest / the / Where / is / ATM / ?
items.explanation: ¿Dónde está el cajero más cercano?

items.prompt: The euro is ________ (strong) than the peso.
items.explanation: Comparativo (no superlativo): 'stronger' (más fuerte).

items.prompt: What is 'boarding'?
items.explanation: Embarcar (boarding) es subir al avión o barco.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (long) flight in the world.
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'long' es 'longest'.

items.prompt: A ________ transaction fee is for using cards in other countries.
items.explanation: La comisión por transacción en el extranjero (foreign transaction fee).

items.prompt: Order the words: my / want / withdraw / I / money / to
items.sentence: I want to withdraw my money
items.explanation: Quiero retirar mi dinero.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (modern) bank in town.
items.explanation: Adjetivo largo: 'the most modern'.

items.prompt: What is 'fee' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Fee' significa comisión o cargo por un servicio.

items.prompt: Is the dollar the ________ (useful) currency for you?
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'useful' es 'most useful'.

items.prompt: Which of these is a ________ (metal) object?
items.explanation: Una moneda (coin) es un objeto de metal.

items.prompt: You should ________ travel insurance before your trip.
items.explanation: Debes comprar (buy) un seguro de viaje.

items.prompt: The ________ (small) bill is 5 euros.
items.explanation: El billete más pequeño (smallest) es de 5 euros.

items.prompt: The city center is the ________ (busy) area.
items.explanation: La zona con más actividad o gente es 'the busiest'.

items.prompt: Order the words: always / Check / rate / the / exchange
items.explanation: Revisa siempre el tipo de cambio.

items.prompt: What is 'withdraw' in Spanish?
items.explanation: 'Withdraw' significa retirar dinero.

items.prompt: The ________ (large) note in euros is 500.
items.explanation: El billete más grande (largest) es de 500.

items.prompt: Is this the ________ (reliable) bureau de change?
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'reliable' (fiable) es 'most reliable'.

items.prompt: The ________ (late) news about the rate is good.
items.explanation: Las últimas noticias (latest news).

items.prompt: Order the words: your / Block / card / immediately
items.explanation: Bloquea tu tarjeta inmediatamente.

items.prompt: What is 'bureau de change' in Spanish?
items.explanation: Es el establecimiento para cambiar moneda.

items.prompt: A ________ is an identity document for traveling.
items.explanation: El pasaporte (passport) es el documento de identidad para viajar.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (expensive) meal of the trip.
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'expensive'.

items.prompt: The ________ (cheap) way to travel is by bus.
items.explanation: La forma más barata (cheapest) es el autobús.

items.prompt: Order the words: money / change / to / I / want / some
items.sentence: I want to change some money
items.explanation: Quiero cambiar algo de dinero.

items.prompt: When the exchange rate is ________, you get more money.
items.explanation: Cuando el tipo de cambio es alto (high), recibes más dinero.

items.prompt: When the exchange rate is ________, you get less money.
items.explanation: Cuando el tipo de cambio es bajo (low), recibes menos dinero.

items.prompt: This is the ________ (beautiful) coin in my collection.
items.explanation: Superlativo de adjetivo largo: 'the most beautiful'.

items.prompt: Is that the ________ (new) model of ATM?
items.explanation: El superlativo de 'new' es 'newest'.

items.prompt: Order the words: secure / This / is / the / method / most
items.sentence: This is the most secure method
items.explanation: Este es el método más seguro.

items.prompt: A ________ is a person who works in a bank.
items.explanation: Un 'banker' es un banquero o empleado de banca.

items.prompt: What is the ________ (important) thing to bring?
items.explanation: Superlativo de 'important'.

items.prompt: Match the superlatives with their opposites:
items.explanation: Superlativos opuestos.

items.prompt: The dollar is ________ (stable) than the ruble.
items.explanation: Comparativo (no superlativo): 'more stable'.

items.prompt: I need to ________ my passport for the flight.
items.explanation: Necesito mostrar (show) mi pasaporte.
